definition: for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: The LORD finds us enough reasons for prayer, and we ought to thank Him that it is so.
sentences.chinese: 上帝乐意听我们的琐碎絮语，我们也该为此献上感谢。

sentences.english: It does this by challenging the end user for credentials.
sentences.chinese: 为此，它要求终端用户提供凭据。

sentences.english: Kratos: You will pay for this Zeus, be certain of that.
sentences.chinese: 你将会为此付出代价的，宙斯，我保证。

sentences.english: I do apologize for giving you the wrong soup.
sentences.chinese: 我上错汤了，我为此道歉。

sentences.english: For this purpose, the laboratory compares its evidence to samples maintained in archives.
sentences.chinese: 为此，实验室会将证物和保管在柜子中的样本做比较。

sentences.english: An investigation team led by the provincial public security department has been formed.
sentences.chinese: 省公安厅为此成立的一个案件调查小组。

sentences.english: It is a charge to keep and I will give it my all.
sentences.chinese: 它是一项要履行的职责，我将为此鞠躬尽瘁。

sentences.english: To do this, you essentially need a rollback script for every change.
sentences.chinese: 为此，实际上每个更改都需要一个回滚脚本。

sentences.english: Meng shu and liu to fisticuffs, as a result, liu pain beat.
sentences.chinese: 为此孟蜀和刘地大打出手，结果刘地被痛揍一顿。

sentences.english: And for that I need a byte of volunteers, alright?
sentences.chinese: 为此，我需要一个字节的志愿者，谁来？

sentences.english: For this reason, the researches on opening up wasteland were always hot.
sentences.chinese: 为此，有关屯垦的研究历来较为活跃。

sentences.english: B You know, she is moody sometimes. I wouldn’t worry about it.
sentences.chinese: 你知道她有时候喜怒无常，我是不会为此而担心的。

sentences.english: Hence, we give a new expression of Slaving Principle and study its relation to Adiabatic Approximation.
sentences.chinese: 为此给出了役使原理的新表述，并探讨两者的关系。

sentences.english: When we investigate soils and divide them, We must pay a great attention to the geological factors in depth.
sentences.chinese: 为此，在土壤调查与区划时，必须重视深部地质因素。

sentences.english: Self-directed learning may open a new avenue for us.
sentences.chinese: 自主学习的研究为此提供了一个思路。

sentences.english: So, I really feel so glad to teach her.
sentences.chinese: 为此，我感到很开心，很高兴曾教她瑜伽。

definition: in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
